abstract.p: A computer trading system includes a quote screening function configured to accept quotes specifying a quote amount in a price where the quote amount is greater than a minimum quote amount to produce screen quote messages and to reject quotes specifying a quote amount less than the minimum quote amount. A market view generator generates market views from those quotes which specify an amount greater than or equal to the minimum quote amount. An order screening function only accepts orders specifying an amount less than a maximum transaction amount submitted in response to the market views to produce screened order messages. A transaction processor receives screened quote messages and screened order messages and matches appropriate messages with each other. The minimum quote amount is substantially equal to or greater than the maximum transaction amount whereby a screened order message can be matched entirely with one screened quote message.

A computerized trading system (2) for trading instruments between counter parties of the type in which quotes to bid or offer instruments are matched with orders to buy or sell instruments. A quote screening function (24) is configured to accept quotes specifying a quote amount and a price where the quote amount is greater than a minimum quote amount to produce screened quote messages and to reject quotes specifying a quote amount less than the minimum quote amount A market view generator (28) generates market views from the quotes which specifies an amount greater than or equal to the minimum quote amount. An order screening function (32) is configured to only accept orders specifying an amount less than a maximum transaction amount submitted in response to the market views to produce screen order messages. A transaction processor (30) is configured to receive screened quote messages and screened order messages and to match the screened order messages with the appropriate screened quote messages. The minimum quote amount is substantially equal to or greater than the maximum transaction amount, whereby a screened order message can be matched entirely with one screened quote message.

A market view generator generates market views from those quotes which specify an amount greater than or equal to the minimum quote amount. An order screening function only accepts orders specifying an amount less than a maximum transaction amount submitted in response to the market views to produce screened order messages. A transaction processor receives screened quote messages and screened order messages and matches appropriate messages with each other.
The minimum quote amount is substantially equal to or greater than the maximum transaction amount whereby a screened order message can be matched entirely with one screened quote message.

A market view generator generates market views from those quotes which specify an amount greater than or equal to the minimum quote amount. An order screening function only accepts orders specifying an amount less than a maximum transaction amount submitted in response to the market views to produce screened order messages. A transaction processor receives screened quote messages and screened order messages and matches appropriate messages with each other.
The minimum quote amount is substantially equal to or greater than the maximum transaction amount whereby a screened order message can be matched entirely with one screened quote message.

A market view generator generates market views from those quotes which specify an amount greater than or equal to the minimum quote amount. An order screening function only-accepts orders specifying an amount less than a maximum transaction amount submitted in response to the market views to produce screened order messages. A transaction processor receives screened quote messages and screened order messages and matches appropriate messages with each other.
The minimum quote amount is substantially equal to or greater than the maximum transaction amount whereby a screened order message can be matched entirely with one screened quote message.

A computer trading system includes a quote screening function configured to accept quotes specifying a quote amount in a price where the quote amount is greater than a minimum quote amount to produce screen quote messages and to reject quotes specifying a quote amount less than the minimum quote amount. A market view generator generates market views from those quotes which specify an amount greater than or equal to the minimum quote amount. An order screening function only-accepts orders specifying an amount less than a maximum transaction amount submitted in response to the market views to produce screened order messages. A transaction processor receives screened quote messages and screened order messages and matches appropriate messages with each other.
The minimum quote amount is substantially equal to or greater than the maximum transaction amount whereby a screened order message can be matched entirely with one screened quote message.

A computerized trading system (2) for trading instruments between counter parties of the type in which quotes to bid or offer instruments are matched with orders to buy or sell instruments. A quote screening function (24) is configured to accept quotes specifying a quote amount and a price where the quote amount is greater than a minimum quote amount to produce screened quote messages and to reject quotes specifying a quote amount less than the minimum quote amount. A market view generator (28) generates market views from the quotes which specifies an amount greater than or equal to the minimum quote amount. An order screening function (32) is configured to only accept orders specifying an amount less than a maximum transaction amount submitted in response to the market views to produce screen order messages. A transaction processor (30) is configured to receive screened quote messages and screened order messages and to match the screened order messages with the appropriate screened quote messages. The minimum quote amount is substantially equal to or greater than the maximum transaction amount, whereby a screened order message can be matched entirely with one screened quote message.

L'invention concerne un système de commerce informatisé (2) permettant le commerce d'instruments entre des contreparties, système dans lequel des propositions de prix pour l'offre d'instruments sont mises en correspondance avec des ordres d'achat ou de vente d'instruments. Une fonction de sélection de propositions de prix (24) est configurée pour accepter des propositions de prix spécifiant une quantité de propositions de prix et un prix, lorsque cette quantité de propositions de prix est supérieure à une quantité minimale de propositions de prix, afin de produire des messages de propositions de prix sélectionnées et pour rejeter des propositions de prix spécifiant une quantité de propositions de prix inférieure à la quantité minimale de propositions de prix.

Un générateur de vues de marché (28) génère des vues de marché à partir de ces propositions de prix, qui spécifient une quantité supérieure ou égale à la quantité minimale de propositions de prix. Une fonction de sélection d'ordres (32) est configurée pour accepter uniquement des ordres spécifiant une quantité inférieure à une quantité maximale de transactions, soumise en réponse aux vues de marché, afin de produire des messages d'ordres sélectionnés. Un processeur de transactions (30) est configuré pour recevoir des messages de propositions de prix sélectionnées ainsi que des messages d'ordres sélectionnés et pour mettre en correspondance les messages d'ordres sélectionnés avec les messages de propositions de prix sélectionnées appropriés.

La quantité minimale de propositions de prix est sensiblement égale ou supérieure à la quantité maximale de transactions, un message d'ordres sélectionnés pouvant être entièrement mis en correspondance avec un message de propositions de prix sélectionnées.
